title: Initiative: Core Game Engine
description: Build the foundational game systems including state management, input handling, physics, and scoring.

title: Epic: Game State Management
description: Implement the core game state machine handling menus, gameplay, pause, and results screens.

title: Create game state machine
description: Implement state machine with states: MainMenu, ModeSelect, LevelSelect, Playing, Paused, Results.
acceptance_criteria: Can transition between all game states. States properly initialize and cleanup.

title: Implement main menu scene
description: Create main menu with Play button, mode selection (Thrower/Catcher), and settings access.
acceptance_criteria: Main menu displays with working navigation buttons.

title: Implement level select scene
description: Create level selection screen showing 10 levels with lock/unlock states and star ratings.
acceptance_criteria: Level select shows all 10 levels. Locked levels are visually distinct. Star ratings display for completed levels.

title: Implement pause menu
description: Create pause overlay with Resume, Restart, and Quit to Menu options.
acceptance_criteria: Pause button pauses game. Pause menu appears with working options.

title: Implement results screen
description: Create end-of-level results showing score, star rating (1-3 treats), and Next Level / Replay / Menu buttons.
acceptance_criteria: Results screen shows score, stars, and navigation options after level ends.

title: Epic: Touch Input System
description: Implement touch input handling for swipe and tap gestures.

title: Implement swipe detection
description: Create swipe gesture detector that calculates direction and velocity from touch start to touch end.
acceptance_criteria: Swipe gestures are detected with accurate direction (8-way or analog) and velocity.

title: Implement tap detection
description: Create tap detector that distinguishes taps from swipes based on movement threshold and duration.
acceptance_criteria: Taps are reliably detected and distinguished from swipes.

title: Test and tune input feel
description: Playtest input system and adjust thresholds for child-friendly responsiveness.
acceptance_criteria: Input feels responsive and natural. A child can reliably perform swipes and taps.

title: Epic: Physics and Collision
description: Implement physics for treat projectiles and collision detection.

title: Implement treat projectile physics
description: Create treat object with arc trajectory based on throw velocity. Include gravity and air resistance.
acceptance_criteria: Treats follow realistic arc trajectory. Velocity affects distance and height.

title: Implement collision detection
description: Detect collisions between treats and dogs, treats and floor, treats and obstacles.
acceptance_criteria: Collisions are detected accurately. Appropriate events fire for catch, miss, and obstacle hit.

title: Epic: Timer and Scoring System
description: Implement level timer, score tracking, and bonus calculations.

title: Implement level timer
description: Create countdown timer with visual display. Trigger level end when timer reaches zero.
acceptance_criteria: Timer counts down visually. Level ends when timer hits zero.

title: Implement base scoring
description: Track successful catches/throws. Award points per catch.
acceptance_criteria: Score increases on successful catch. Score displays on HUD.

title: Implement streak bonus system
description: Track consecutive catches. Award bonus multiplier starting at 5 catches in a row.
acceptance_criteria: Streak counter displays. Bonus triggers at 5+ consecutive catches with visual feedback.

title: Implement speed bonus system
description: Award bonus for achieving X catches within 10 seconds.
acceptance_criteria: Speed bonus triggers and displays when catch threshold met within time window.

title: Implement star rating calculation
description: Calculate 1-3 treat star rating based on final score vs level thresholds.
acceptance_criteria: Star rating calculated at level end. Thresholds are configurable per level.

title: Epic: Soft Failure Handling
description: Handle low performance gracefully without harsh 'game over' states that frustrate young players.

title: Design soft failure approach
description: Define how game handles poor performance: no game over, always complete level, encourage retry.
acceptance_criteria: Soft failure approach documented. No punishing 'game over' screen.

title: Implement level completion regardless of score
description: All levels complete when time ends, even with zero catches. Show encouraging results.
acceptance_criteria: Level always ends with results screen. No 'fail' state. Zero-star is still a completion.

title: Implement encouraging low-score messaging
description: Show supportive messages for low scores: 'The dogs are still hungry! Try again?' rather than 'You failed'.
acceptance_criteria: Low-score results are encouraging, not discouraging. Motivates replay.

title: Implement progressive unlock even on low scores
description: Unlock next level even with 0-1 stars. Stars are for mastery, not gating.
acceptance_criteria: Completing a level (any score) unlocks the next. No star requirements for progression.
